name: HBDIE: The Nonce
description:
HBDIE The Nonce

HBDIE The Nonce is a short horror game where you are a child and have to avoid the fat man from touching you up, to win the game you have to do two simple tasks!

1. Don't get touched by the very popular, most shookhead and the fattest guy on Twitch  called "Hbdie"

2. Collect Hbdie's Dusty Bally's in order to win.

If you get touched by the fat man, you lose! 

SO DONT GET TOUCHED U WASTEMAN!
